summary:
Senior Business Controller, with a demonstrated history in the Consultancy, Automotive and Information Technology & Services industries. Being the link between Finance, Project Management and Operations. 11+ years of experience in corporate processes, back-office compliance maintenance and team management.

Translating operational reality into financial reports, effectively communicating with management and other team members. Expert in data analysis, digital transformation, accounting and innovation with a strong background in finance and project management. Expert in financial control instruments, profitability analysis, observation of KPIs and accounting standards.

Strong finance professional, with an MBA in Finance (IBMEC), a bachelor in Accounting (PUC-SP) and Business Administration (Unibero-SP). Fluent in Portuguese, English, and Spanish. Aiming to gain experience in management control, financial management, business intelligence and digital transformation. Previous experience working in the LATAM, US & EU markets, with major ERPs, creative market strategy, preparation and revision of financial statements, reconciliation of accounts, internal controls & SOX assessments, preparation of budgets, and management of capital spending.

Hands-on experience, focusing on the desired project result. Ease of working on teams, international experience, clear/precise communicator, comprehensive, detail oriented and relevant leadership skills. Ability to interact and advise management on strategic and operational decisions.

Goals: Bring my experience in Business Controlling to reduce operations costs while increasing productivity and revenue by determining and pursuing key financial drivers and improving processes using IT-applications.

Relevant Skills:

► Financial Analysis

► Process Optimization

► Financial Strategic Planning

► Business Controlling
